spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant door placement issues in the central hallway; the kitchen entrance is incorrectly modeled. Window placement on the southern wall of the bathrooms/bedrooms is inconsistent with the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Garage is detached incorrectly or lacks a proper connecting context. Hallucinated balcony/railing elements added to the entry area. Internal wall partitions for the laundry/wardrobe area are merged incorrectly.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinetry follows the general layout, but bathroom fixtures are simplified or misplaced compared to the technical drawings.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good isometric perspective and clean rendering. Lighting is diffuse but effective for a schematic view, though geometry on the garage door is slightly distorted.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated balcony railing at the front entrance/entry area not present in the 2D plan.
The garage is positioned as a separate floating volume rather than maintaining its spatial relationship shown on the diagram.
Door to Bedroom 2 is misplaced or missing its clear opening from the hallway.
Missing specific closet (Robe) partition detail between the Kitchen/Laundry and Bedroom 1.
Entrance door orientation and linen closet niche are structurally misinterpreted in the 3D extrusion.
